name: .OPZ File Extension
summary: Learn about .OPZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: An OPZ file is a Zip package that contains a FlipViewer FlipBook. The package contains an .OPF file and the FlipBook's imported content. FlipViewer users package FlipBooks as OPZ files to make them easier to share.

content: FlipViewer FlipBooks are typically comprised of an OPF file, which lists and organizes the FlipBook's contents, and many content files. Optionally, users can instead save a FlipBook as a zipped OPZ file. Doing so compresses the FlipBook's contents into a single file, making it easier to share the FlipBook with other FlipViewer users.

instructions: You can open an OPZ file with E-Book Systems FlipViewer and Mac FlipViewer. You can also decompress an OPZ file with any Zip-decompression utility, to retrieve the constituent files it contains. (You may first have to change the file's extension to .zip.)
